long_description:
This texture pack hide your hud to make it more easier to take screenshots or make cinematic videos without hud on mobile.

This is mostly designed for Luanti mobile.

check out @therealhirohitoo on youtube to know more about how to make your ui clearer on mobile.
name: hud_hider
short_description: Make your hud invisible on mobile.
title: Hud Hider
